about.title: More about
about.subtitle: About
about.description: Hello! I'm John Doe, a Full Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience building web applications and digital solutions. I specialize in JavaScript frameworks like React and Angular on the frontend, and Node.js, Python, and Java on the backend. With a strong background in cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure), database design, and system architecture, I pride myself on creating clean, efficient code that solves real business problems. I'm passionate about continuous learning and staying updated with emerging technologies.
about.shortdescription: Full Stack Developer with expertise in JavaScript, Python, and cloud technologies. Passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems.

timelineData.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
timelineData.description: Leading a team of 5 developers in building scalable web applications. Implementing microservices architecture using Node.js and React. Migrated legacy systems to cloud infrastructure, resulting in a 40% improvement in performance and reliability.

timelineData.title: Full Stack Developer
timelineData.description: Developed and maintained multiple client websites and web applications. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Express and MongoDB. Collaborated with UX designers to create intuitive user interfaces.

timelineData.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
timelineData.description: Specialized in Software Engineering and Artificial Intelligence. Completed thesis on 'Optimizing Database Performance in Cloud Environments'. Participated in various hackathons and coding competitions.

timelineData.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
timelineData.description: Graduated with honors. Key coursework included Data Structures, Algorithms, Computer Architecture, and Software Engineering.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard. Implemented responsive design for optimal viewing on all devices.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A collaborative task management application designed for remote teams. Built with TypeScript, React, and Firebase. Features include real-time updates, task assignment, progress tracking, and team chat functionality.

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.description: A weather forecast application that provides real-time weather data from multiple locations. Built with Python (FastAPI) backend and React frontend. Integrates with OpenWeatherMap API and features interactive maps using Leaflet.js.
